titles.title: A bill to ensure payment of United States assessments for United Nations peacekeeping operations in 2005 and 2006.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 12/13/2005--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995 to provide for U.S. payments for 2005-2006 U.N. peacekeeping operations at 27.1%. (Current law provides for a 25% payment rate.) (Amends the Department of State and Related Agency Appropriations Act, 2005 to repeal the provision providing for 2005 payments at 27.1%.)
